page.title: 04HOME LIFE IN NEWBOLD
page.content:
Most people use things like cookers, washing machines and spin dryers. People use knives and forks to prepare food. Also we use utensils like bottle openers, tin openers, corkscrews,tea towels and cups and saucers.In a{house}in the living room people have chairs, and things like a television and video recorder. In a house there are usually 2,3 or 4 bedrooms, a hall, a living room, kitchen and bathroom.
Most people in our village have a {garden}and go out and help plant seeds and shrubs and make the garden look nice. Some people have a{garage in which they keep the car, and others put their garden tools. Most children have a bike on which they can ride around.
